item.title: Pareto-optimal compression
item.author: jonas@insanity.industries (Jonas Große Sundrup)
item.description: Everyone wants good compression. But what exactly is good compression? Time for a closer look.

item.title: Tracking leftover packages with pacman
item.author: jonas@insanity.industries (Jonas Große Sundrup)
item.description: Package managers take care of resolving dependencies for you, but over time, dependencies that are no longer needed might stay around. Time to change that.
item.content:encoded: Automatically resolving and installing dependencies is one of the core features of package managers (and one of the most convenient)...
